price: 58. Rabbigaana (Alle) waa Denbi Dhaaf Badanaha, Naxariista Badan. Hadduu u qaban dadka waxay kasbadaan (oo denbiyo ah), wuxuu u soo dedejin lahaa cadaabka. Waxayse leeyihiin waqti go'an (Maalinta Qiyaamaha) oo aanay helayn meelay (kaga baxsadaan ama) ka magan galaan.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ذُو ٱلرَّحۡمَةِۖ لَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُهُم بِمَا كَسَبُواْ لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ بَل لَّهُم مَّوۡعِدٞ لَّن يَجِدُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَوۡئِلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: warabbuka al-ghafūru dhū al-raḥmati law yuākhidhuhum bimā kasabū laʿajjala lahumu al-ʿadhāba bal lahum mawʿidun lan yajidū min dūnihi mawilan
